TextView.android:text:
1.A Deer can move either in 4 ways ( Left, right, top and bottom ) position. 
 2. When pressing on a Deer all the adjacency node/place of the Deer will be shown as green color.
 3. Then the Deer can move to any of the green marked nodes.
 4. Deer can move from one node to other once at a time. 
 5. If you press on a Deer, you can press on another Deer to move that deer if you do not move the previous one.
 6. A Deer can not eat theTiger or jump over the Tiger. 7. A Deer can not jump over another Deers. 
 8. If the Deers can stop the movement of Tiger or the Tiger got stuck cannot move then the Deer will win 
 
 9. Tiger can jump over Deer to eat them. 
 10. Tiger can eat Deer or not if he wish. After eating if the remainig Deers are less than 4 then Tiger will win.
